Adoptable Doggies.description: Used data visualization to reveal the most common types of breeds and other dogs up for adoption using data acquired by  data mining PetFinder's API.

ColorDupeFinder.description: Developed a tool that allows users to find similar makeup of a particular color. It's queries the Makeup API and uses data mining techniques in order to find the colors most similar.
